content: this digital pdf pattern for an espeon amigurumi crochet doll stands at approximately 3 15 inches or ~8cm tall when finished excluding the ears so from the base to the top of the head no physical doll will ship this is a digital instruction booklet for making your own this is an ad-free digital download of a pattern that can be found for free on my website at www 53stitches com the pattern includes 2 pdf documents one is a photo-tutorial of the pattern itself the other is a photo-tutorial document on the stitches and techniques used in the pattern for amigurumi beginners for this pattern you will need - 3 00mm crochet hook - polyester filling - 2x 10 00mm safety eyes - brown yarn 8ply / dk - cream yarn 8ply / dk - brown felt - fabric glue - felting needle - cream felting wool there are instructions to make this from your cream yarn if you don t have this - yarn needle - scissors the pattern is written in us terms and worked in continuous rounds
